product_description: Product Description: Material: Rubber. Color: Black, Red, White, Blue, Grey. Length: 16FT(5m). Width: 10mm. Edge thickness: 8mm. Package Included: 1x 5M White Rubber Edge Trim. Perfect lines The smooth lines and delicate texture can be bent arbitrarily according to the radian of the car door, which not only has the practical function of protecting the car door, but also adds a sporty style and makes the car look cooler. Solid structure The door edge anti-collision strip adopts high-quality metal skeleton structure, which can well clamp the door edge, not easy to fall off, and increase the performance. Longer service life Designed with natural rubber material, it is resistant to high temperature, corrosion, drop and wear, and has a long service life. Methods of Installation: 1.Clean the door edge of your car to remove any oil, wax and dust. Make sure the door is dry before continuing. 2.Uncover the tape from the tip of the lining (Ensure the tape is install INSIDE the door) and peel the red strip off the tape by approximately 2 inches. 3.Start from the top, insert the lining onto your door edge until the lining is fully seated. 4.Press the lining with your thumb along the door edge until it is fully seated, then pull the red strip off. 5.Repeat step 4 until all edges are protected. 6.Use scissors to cut away unused lining for other door edges. 7.Let the lining dry up by itself and do not get wet for at least 12 hours.
